alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 4:44AM PST until January 05 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations 6 to 10 inches expected above 3500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Snow level will gradually rise, up to 7000 feet this evening. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very challenging at times. Patchy blowing snow may reduce visibility at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Drivers should be prepared for icy or snow covered roads and very dangerous winter like driving conditions. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
